snippet: All the News That’s Fit to Screen is a film series about journalism at the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts.
abstract: All the News That’s Fit to Screen film series about newspaper journalism at the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts shows how Hollywood has glamorized the profession, adding style and wit to the ordinary workday of the newsroom.
lead_paragraph: All the News That’s Fit to Screen is a film series about journalism at the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts.

headline.seo: All the News That’s Fit to Screen: Movies About Journalism
headline.main: Real Reporters on the Screen? Get Me Rewrite!
